description: This week Tommy is in trouble...triple trouble that is. With Fox and Denny joining the fun, this week's update is smokin' hot!Tommy hadn't seen Fox and Denny fool around with each other yet, so that's what he wanted to film.He sits the two on the couch and asks a few questions, but since this isn't an interview, Tommy gets straight to the point and tells the two to get it on.As Fox is in the middle of sucking Denny's cock while Tommy's filming, Denny goes for it, and pulls down Tommy's pants, while Fox dives straight to sucking Tommy's cock. This of course spirals out of control into a mad 3 way suck and fuck that shows men can have plenty of fun when they're 'out with the boys'.Everyone had a great time.Enjoy!
title: Triple Trouble
